variants.name: cuda
variants.description: Build dependencies with support for CUDA

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: ncurses
dependencies.description:
The ncurses (new curses) library is a free software emulation of curses
in System V Release 4.0, and more. It uses terminfo format, supports
pads and color and multiple highlights and forms characters and
function-key mapping, and has all the other SYSV-curses enhancements
over BSD curses.

dependencies.name: libzmq
dependencies.description: The ZMQ networking/concurrency library and core API

dependencies.name: czmq
dependencies.description: A C interface to the ZMQ library

dependencies.name: hwloc
dependencies.description:
The Hardware Locality (hwloc) software project. The Portable Hardware
Locality (hwloc) software package provides a portable abstraction
(across OS, versions, architectures, ...) of the hierarchical topology
of modern architectures, including NUMA memory nodes, sockets, shared
caches, cores and simultaneous multithreading. It also gathers various
system attributes such as cache and memory information as well as the
locality of I/O devices such as network interfaces, InfiniBand HCAs or
GPUs. It primarily aims at helping applications with gathering
information about modern computing hardware so as to exploit it
accordingly and efficiently.

dependencies.name: lua
dependencies.description: The Lua programming language interpreter and library.

dependencies.name: lua-luaposix
dependencies.description: Lua posix bindings, including ncurses

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-cffi
dependencies.description: Foreign Function Interface for Python calling C code

dependencies.name: py-six
dependencies.description: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: jansson
dependencies.description:
Jansson is a C library for encoding, decoding and manipulating JSON
data.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: yaml-cpp
dependencies.description: A YAML parser and emitter in C++

dependencies.name: lz4
dependencies.description:
LZ4 is lossless compression algorithm, providing compression speed at
400 MB/s per core, scalable with multi-cores CPU. It also features an
extremely fast decoder, with speed in multiple GB/s per core, typically
reaching RAM speed limits on multi-core systems.

dependencies.name: asciidoc
dependencies.description:
A presentable text document format for writing articles, UNIX man pages
and other small to medium sized documents.

dependencies.name: py-docutils
dependencies.description:
Docutils is an open-source text processing system for processing
plaintext documentation into useful formats, such as HTML, LaTeX, man-
pages, open-document or XML. It includes reStructuredText, the easy to
read, easy to use, what-you-see-is-what-you-get plaintext markup
language.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: mpich
dependencies.description:
MPICH is a high performance and widely portable implementation of the
Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard.

dependencies.name: valgrind
dependencies.description:
An instrumentation framework for building dynamic analysis. There are
Valgrind tools that can automatically detect many memory management and
threading bugs, and profile your programs in detail. You can also use
Valgrind to build new tools. Valgrind is Open Source / Free Software,
and is freely available under the GNU General Public License, version 2.

dependencies.name: jq
dependencies.description: jq is a lightweight and flexible command-line JSON processor.

dependent_to.name: libyogrt
dependent_to.description: Your One Get Remaining Time Library.

dependent_to.name: mpibind
dependent_to.description:
A memory-driven algorithm to map parallel codes to heterogeneous
architectures

dependent_to.name: flux-pmix
dependent_to.description: A flux shell plugin to bootstrap openmpi v5+

dependent_to.name: exaworks
dependent_to.description: Virtual package for the Exaworks SDK packages.
